name: Scroll to Top
summary: Smooth scroll-to-top button with animations
description: A beautiful, smooth scroll-to-top button that elegantly appears after you scroll down and takes you back to the top with a delightful animation.

name: Refresh Button
summary: Button that invalidates React Query keys
description: A button that invalidates React Query keys and shows toast notifications when refreshing data.

name: Export Button
summary: Export data with loading states
description: A button that exports data to CSV with timestamp and loading states during the export process.

name: Auto Save Form
summary: Automatically save form data
description: A form that auto-saves with debounce and localStorage backup to prevent data loss.

name: Network Status Listener
summary: Listen to network status changes
description: A powerful React component that automatically monitors network connectivity and provides elegant toast notifications when you go offline or come back online.

name: Optimistic Action Button
summary: Optimistic UI updates for actions
description: A button that updates UI immediately and rolls back on error, providing instant feedback to users.

name: Keyboard Shortcuts
summary: Manage and display keyboard shortcuts
description: A powerful keyboard shortcuts manager that helps users discover and use keyboard shortcuts efficiently. Press Cmd+K (or Ctrl+K) to open the shortcuts dialog.

name: Empty States
summary: Contextual empty states for different scenarios
description: Beautiful, contextual empty states that provide clear feedback and guidance to users. Choose from multiple pre-configured types or customize your own.

name: Text Truncation
summary: Intelligent text truncation with expand/collapse
description: Intelligently truncate long text with expand/collapse functionality. Supports both line-based and character-based truncation with automatic detection.

name: Consequence Confirmation Dialog
summary: Flexible confirmation dialogs with multiple variants
description: A flexible confirmation dialog component with multiple variants and a convenient hook for programmatic usage. Perfect for confirming destructive actions or important operations.

name: Copy to Clipboard
summary: Copy text to clipboard with animations and toast
description: A beautiful copy-to-clipboard button with smooth animations, toast notifications, and support for both plain text and HTML content.

name: Restore Scroll Position
summary: Remember and restore scroll positions
description: Automatically remember and restore scroll positions when users navigate away and come back. Supports both session storage and persistent local storage.

name: Share Button
summary: YouTube-style share button with native API and social media
description: A YouTube-style share button with native Share API fallback, copy link functionality, and social media integration.

name: Resizable Panels
summary: LeetCode-style resizable panels with persistent layouts
description: LeetCode-style resizable panels with horizontal and vertical layouts, collapsible panels, persistent layouts, and custom cursors.

name: Table of Contents
summary: Auto-generated table of contents from markdown with active highlighting
description: Automatically generate a table of contents from markdown content with active section highlighting and smooth scrolling navigation.

name: Stateful Button
summary: Button with loading, success, and error states with rate limiting
description: A button component that manages loading, success, and error states with animations, rate limiting, and automatic state transitions.

name: Search Input
summary: Search input with fuzzy search, debouncing, and speech recognition
description: A powerful search input with fuzzy search, debouncing, and speech recognition capabilities for enhanced user experience.

name: Share QR Code
summary: Instagram-style QR code sharing with customizable themes
description: Instagram-style QR code sharing with customizable themes, download functionality, and integrated share actions.

name: Ask Agent
summary: Reddit-style Ask Agent page with animated tags and voice input
description: Ask questions and get instant answers. Use voice input or type your message.

name: User Card
summary: User card component with LinkedIn and Twitter variants, light and dark mode
description: Beautiful user card components with multiple variants (LinkedIn, TwitterLogo) and full light/dark mode support.

name: FAQ Hints
summary: FAQ component with short answer hints and expandable details
description: An elegant FAQ component with short answer hints and expandable details for better user experience.

name: Health Bar
summary: Visual health indicator with color-coded status and timer
description: A visual health indicator with color-coded status, timer, and customizable data sources.

name: Language Switcher
summary: Flexible language switcher with adapter pattern and country flags
description: A flexible language switcher with adapter pattern support for various i18n libraries and configurable persistence.

name: Page Loader
summary: Full-featured page loader with refresh functionality and animations
description: A full-featured page loader with refresh functionality, customizable branding, and smooth animations.

name: Subscription Identifier
summary: Badge component for subscription status with multiple variants
description: A badge component that displays subscription status with elegant styling and multiple variants.

name: Report Button
summary: Comprehensive report dialog with issue selection and TanStack Query
description: A comprehensive report dialog with issue selection, custom descriptions, and TanStack Query integration.

name: Unique Value Proposition
summary: Scatter plot visualization for comparing products across two dimensions
description: A scatter plot visualization component for comparing products or services across two dimensions with interactive tooltips and customizable styling.

name: Domain Badge
summary: Visual badge component displaying multiple domain indicators with tooltips
description: A visual badge component that displays multiple domain indicators with interactive tooltips and customizable styling.

name: Upgrade Button
summary: Smart button that adapts based on subscription status with configurable actions
description: A smart button component that adapts its appearance and behavior based on subscription status with configurable actions.

name: Page Header
summary: Full-width page header with glass morphism icon and optional actions
description: A full-width page header component with glass morphism icon, title, subtitle, and optional action buttons.

name: Grid Card
summary: Flexible card component for grid layouts with header, content, and footer
description: A flexible card component designed for grid layouts with header, content, footer sections, and interactive states.

name: Onboarding
summary: Multi-step onboarding layout with stepper navigation and progress tracking
description: A comprehensive multi-step onboarding layout with stepper navigation, progress tracking, and responsive design.

name: Test Case Badge
summary: Test results badge with passed/failed counts and progress indicator
description: A badge component that displays test results with passed/failed counts and a circular progress indicator showing success percentage.

name: Scrollable Breadcrumbs
summary: Horizontally scrollable breadcrumb navigation with auto-scroll
description: A horizontally scrollable breadcrumb component that automatically scrolls to show the current page with fade indicators and custom icons.

name: Notification Shade
summary: Comprehensive notification panel with tabbed filtering and smart icons
description: A comprehensive notification panel with tabbed filtering, smart icons, and responsive design for desktop and mobile.

name: Compare Alternatives
summary: Flexible comparison table for comparing features across alternatives
description: A flexible comparison table component for comparing features across multiple alternatives with responsive design and customizable values.

name: Filter Sheet
summary: Comprehensive filter sheet with multiple filter types and configurations
description: A comprehensive filter sheet component with support for multiple filter types including selects, checkboxes, multiselects, and tags.

name: Persistence TipTap Editor
summary: Rich text editor with localStorage persistence and database sync
description: Rich text editor with automatic localStorage persistence and optional database synchronization. Supports auto-save, manual save, and multiple persistence strategies.

name: Variant Select
summary: Flexible variant selector with dependency visualization and persistent state
description: Flexible variant selector with dependency visualization, stack badges, and persistent selection state. Supports both display and selector modes.

name: Active Devices
summary: Manage and monitor active sessions across all devices with location tracking
description: Manage and monitor active sessions across all your devices. View device information, locations, and revoke sessions securely.
